story.title: Independent fiduciary expert saves 50% time

challenge.title: The challenge
challenge.description: "As an independent fiduciary, I was busy with repetitive tasks daily: manually entering invoices, compiling reports, transferring data between different systems. This cost me valuable time that I would rather have spent advising my clients."

solution.title: The solution
items: AI-supported report generation from raw data
Direct integration into existing accounting software

story.quote: "I can now focus on what I do best: advising my clients. AI takes over the routine – error-free and reliable."

tech_stack.title: Our technology partners
tech_stack.subtitle: Proven tools and platforms for maximum security and reliability

azure.title: Azure AI & OpenAI
azure.description: We host state-of-the-art AI models like GPT-5, GPT-4.1, GPT-4o (text, image, audio) as well as specialized reasoning models (o-series). The Azure Model Catalog also provides Llama 3, Mistral, Cohere, DeepSeek, NVIDIA and many other partner models.

n8n.title: n8n – securely hosted
n8n.description: Our automation workflows run in our own Azure environment. This keeps all data within a protected system – FADP compliant, encrypted and scalable.

database.title: PostgreSQL / Supabase
database.description: We rely on local PostgreSQL databases or Supabase cloud solutions – depending on customer needs, from on-premises to scalable SaaS architecture.

erp.title: ERP & accounting integrations
erp.description: Bexio, Abacus, Sage and other Swiss solutions are seamlessly connected. This allows us to automate financial processes from receipt to reporting.

ecommerce.title: Shop integrations
ecommerce.description: Whether Shopware, Shopify or other platforms – we connect your e-commerce with accounting, ERP or CRM for seamless workflows.

apis.title: APIs & cloud services
apis.description: Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, individual APIs – we integrate existing systems securely and efficiently.

compliance.question: FADP/GDPR compliant
compliance.answer: Yes – With data minimization, CH/EU hosting and DPA contracts for maximum security.

tools.question: Which tools do you use?
tools.answer: Only stable solutions like n8n, OpenAI/Anthropic, Supabase, Bexio and Shopware.

start.question: How do we start?
start.answer: Brief initial meeting, followed by workshop, small pilot, review and rollout.

cta.title: Let's get to know each other
cta.subtitle: A short conversation quickly shows whether the chemistry is right and we can help you.

hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Direct answers to the most important points

compliant.question: Is this FADP/GDPR compliant?
compliant.answer: Yes, absolutely. We only work with providers that offer FADP/GDPR compliant solutions. All data is processed in Switzerland or the EU. We create a data protection impact assessment for each project and offer DPA contracts.

data_location.question: Where is the data processed?
data_location.answer: By default, we use servers in Switzerland (Supabase) or EU (OpenAI Europe). For particularly sensitive data, we can also implement on-premise solutions.

data_access.question: Who has access to our data?
data_access.answer: Only authorized persons from your company. We implement role-based access control and encrypted transmission. Our technicians only have temporary access for maintenance work.

tools.question: Which tools do you use?
tools.answer: We rely on proven tools: n8n for workflow automation, OpenAI/Anthropic for AI features, Supabase as database, plus integrations to Bexio, Shopware and other Swiss business tools. Everything enterprise-ready and maintainable.

scalable.question: Are the solutions scalable?
scalable.answer: Yes, we build scalable from the start. n8n and Supabase grow with your company. For larger volumes, we can switch to dedicated servers.

availability.question: What happens if a tool is no longer available?
availability.answer: We only rely on tools with strong market position. Should a tool still be discontinued, we migrate your workflows to alternative solutions – this is included in our support.

start.question: How do we start?
start.answer: Very simple: 1) Free 30-min conversation, 2) Workshop to get to know each other and identify first use case, 3) Small pilot process, 4) Review and rollout. We always start small.

duration.question: How long does an implementation take?
duration.answer: A first pilot process usually 1-2 weeks. More complex workflows 4-8 weeks. We work iteratively – you see first results quickly.

expertise.question: Do we have to become AI experts beforehand?
expertise.answer: No, that's our job. We explain everything understandably and train your team as much as necessary. You remain experts for your business, we take care of the technology.

self_service.question: Can we adjust the workflows ourselves later?
self_service.answer: Yes, that's the goal. n8n is user-friendly and we document everything. After the initial setup, technically savvy employees can make minor adjustments themselves.

support.question: What about support?
support.answer: We accompany you until it works in everyday life. This includes: 30 days email support after each workshop, monthly check-ins in the first 3 months, and available maintenance contracts for ongoing support.

support_cost.question: What does ongoing support cost?
support_cost.answer: That depends on the scope. Basic monitoring and minor adjustments from CHF 200/month. For complex setups or SLA guarantees correspondingly more. Everything transparently calculated.

training.question: Do you also offer training?
training.answer: Yes, both one-time workshops and ongoing training. From AI basics for executives to technical deep dives for IT teams. Online or on-site throughout Switzerland.
